attributes.action: Stop the visit of mass murderer Narendra Modi to the UK
attributes.additional_details: Narendra Modi is the chief-minister of Gujarath, a north-western state of India. He was leading and facilitating the 'Gujarath-riot' massacre in 2002, when thousands of people were killed. He is a politician who cherish hindu extremist ideology. He has been invited by a British MP to lecture about India in the British parliament. A court in India has sentenced his close friends, one of them who was also a minister of his cabinet Maya Kodnani, to 28 years in prison for the above said riot. Narendra modi is hoping to become the Prime minister of India with the support of hindu nationalist party BJP. Our humble request is that we should not allow this evil mass murderer to use Britain as a platform to enhance his political career. Kindly refuse him entry to the United Kingdom for the sake of peace and tranquility in India.
